body_html: run_local was also updated to work well with train_and_evaluate. See 3edb609. This should be in 1.10. So, if you really want to use early stopping before 1.10 release, I suggest also patching in this PR. But I recommend waiting for 1.10 so that you don't have more trouble.

body: run_local was also updated to work well with train_and_evaluate. See 3edb609. This should be in 1.10. So, if you really want to use early stopping before 1.10 release, I suggest also patching in this PR. But I recommend waiting for 1.10 so that you don't have more trouble.
